item.title: if the beatles used adele's naming system for their albums...
item.description: Adele has so far used her age as the title of her LPs. So, her LPs have been called: 19 21 25 Using Paul’s age for the album title, I think the Beatles albums would have been as follows: 20 21 22 22 (again) 23 23 (again) 24 24 (again) 26 26 (again) 27 27 (again) Release date Paul's age Album name Adele-system Album name 22/03/63 20.
